derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin congratulatio(n-), from the verb congratulari (see congratulate)

entry.def: If you congratulate someone, you say something to show you are pleased that something nice has happened to them.

example.ex: She congratulated him on the birth of his son...
I was absolutely astonished by the reaction to our engagement. Everyone started congratulating us.
example.tran: 大家对我们订婚的反应让我非常惊讶。所有人都开始祝贺我们。

entry.def: If you congratulate someone, you praise them for something good that they have done.

example.ex: I really must congratulate the organisers for a well run and enjoyable event...
example.tran: 活动安排得有条不紊，充满乐趣，我必须要称赞一下组织者。

example.ex: We specifically wanted to congratulate certain players.
example.tran: 我们特别想表扬几名选手。

entry.tran: 为(自己)感到高兴(或自豪）
entry.def: If you congratulate yourself, you are pleased about something that you have done or that has happened to you.

example.ex: Waterstone has every reason to congratulate himself...
example.tran: 沃特斯通完全有理由为自己感到高兴。

example.ex: Journalists have been congratulating themselves on the role the press has played in the investigations.
example.tran: 记者们为新闻界在调查中所起的作用感到自豪。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of acknowledging that someone has an occasion for celebration
2. (usually plural) an expression of pleasure at the success or good fortune of another;

sentences.sentence: "I sent them my sincere congratulations on their marriage"

stems_affixes.word_buile: accommodate向…提供住处+ion动作或状态等→accommodation住处,膳宿
communicate交流;通讯+ion动作或状态等→communication传达,信息
congratulate祝贺,庆贺+ion动作或状态等→congratulation祝词,贺辞
consolidate巩固,加强+ion动作或状态等→consolidation巩固,合并
correlate使相互关联+ion动作或状态等→correlation相互关系,相关[性]
dictate口述,口授+ion动作或状态等→dictation
elevate举起,提拔+ion动作或状态等→elevation上升,提高
eliminate除去;淘汰;排[删,消]除+ion动作或状态等→elimination排除,除去,消除,消灭

stems_affixes.value_cn: 用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
stems_affixes.word_buile: formulate用公式表示;系统地阐述+ion动作或状态等→formulation用公式表示,明确地表达,作简洁陈述
imitate模仿+ion动作或状态等→imitation模仿,效法
introduce引入,介绍+tion动作或状态等→introduction介绍
irrigate灌溉+ion动作或状态等→irrigation灌溉
reduce减少,缩小+tion动作或状态等→reduction减少

stems_affixes.value_cn: 关系,联系,叙述,故事,亲戚
stems_affixes.word_buile: relate叙述,讲,使联系,发生关系+ion动作或状态等→relation关系,联系,叙述
reproduce生殖;再现;繁殖+tion动作或状态等→n.繁殖,再现,复制品
requisite需要的+ion动作或状态等→requisition征用,要求

stems_affixes.value_cn: 翻译,译文,转化,调任,转换[物][数]平移
stems_affixes.word_buile: translate翻译,解释;转化+ion动作或状态等→translation翻译,译文,转化
